Class SANDecoder

java.lang.Object
app.chess.san.SANDecoder
public class SANDecoder extends Object
Utility class for decoding moves from standard algebraic notation

    • getMatchingPiece

      static ChessPiece getMatchingPiece(GameView<ChessMove,ChessPiece> chess, int player, ChessPieceKind kind, Field targetField, SANDecoder.Modifiers modifiers)
      Get a piece that can move to a given field and meet criteria

      Throws InvalidSANMove if it cannot unambiguously determine the piece

      Parameters:
      chess - chess game that provides list of moves
      player - player that makes the move
      kind - kind of the piece
      targetField - target field
      modifiers - additional information
      Returns:
      list of matching pieces
